snippet.title: Chuck's Challenge 3D - Trailer - PC, Mac & Linux - Steam
snippet.description:
Here's the Steam game trailer for Chuck's Challenge 3D, the spiritual successor to Chip's Challenge, in Play mode. We've been working over the last 4 months to create a new version with enhanced graphics and special Steam features including achievements and trading cards.

Steam - http://store.steampowered.com/app/262590
